statements: SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_location, disposal_date FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT id, compliance_status FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_entries FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY disposal_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT waste_type, disposal_location FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE disposal_location LIKE 'City%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_date FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC
SELECT id, disposal_location, compliance_status FROM Waste_Disposal_Tracking WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill'
SELECT id, waste_type FROM HazardousWasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE waste_type LIKE '%acid%'
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRegulations ORDER BY last_inspection
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration'
SELECT id, waste_type FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY last_inspection DESC
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE last_inspection < '2022-06-01'
SELECT id, disposal_date FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE waste_type LIKE '%Hazardous%'
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposal;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_location FROM WasteDisposal;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRegulations WHERE regulation_type='Environmental';
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_date FROM WasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT wt.id, wd.waste_type, cr.regulation_type FROM WasteTracking wt JOIN WasteDisposal wd ON wt.waste_id = wd.id JOIN ComplianceRegulations cr ON wt.compliance_id = cr.id;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM WasteDisposal GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT wd.id, wd.waste_type, wr.regulation_description FROM WasteDisposal wd INNER JOIN WasteTracking wt ON wd.id = wt.waste_id INNER JOIN ComplianceRegulations wr ON wt.compliance_id = wr.id;
SELECT wr.regulation_type, wd.waste_type FROM ComplianceRegulations wr LEFT JOIN WasteTracking wt ON wr.id = wt.compliance_id LEFT JOIN WasteDisposal wd ON wt.waste_id = wd.id;
SELECT disposal_location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM WasteDisposal GROUP BY disposal_location HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposal;
SELECT waste_name, disposal_date FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill';
SELECT waste_name, disposal_location FROM HazardousWasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteRegulations WHERE regulator_name LIKE 'EPA%';
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_method FROM WasteTracking WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteDisposal
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_method FROM HazardousWasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT waste_name, disposal_date, disposal_location FROM HazardousWasteDisposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill'
SELECT w.waste_name, c.compliance_date, c.compliance_status FROM HazardousWasteDisposal w JOIN WasteCompliance c ON w.waste_id = c.waste_id
SELECT r.regulation_name, r.regulator_name, wc.compliance_date FROM WasteRegulations r LEFT JOIN WasteCompliance wc ON r.regulation_id = wc.regulation_id ORDER BY wc.compliance_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date = '2022-10-31';
SELECT disposal_date, waste_type, disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_tracking WHERE tracking_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM waste_locations WHERE location_contact LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, disposal_method, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' AND disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT disposal_id, compliance_type, compliance_status FROM waste_compliance INNER JOIN waste_tracking ON waste_compliance.disposal_id = waste_tracking.disposal_id WHERE tracking_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM waste_locations WHERE location_contact LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT disposal_id, audit_date, audit_result, remarks FROM waste_audit WHERE audit_result = 'Non-Compliant' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
